response.overview: After 35 years of speculation and controversy, the true untold story of the 1989-1990 UNLV college basketball National Championship team unfolds as all 13 players lift the veil on behind-the-scenes events that fueled decades of conspiracy theories, marking the team as the 'bad boys of basketball.' Candidly addressing allegations of 'NIL before NIL,' including claims of receiving cash, cars, apartments, and other illegal benefits, along with grade tampering for eligibility, feuds with the public, and corruption in extensive NCAA investigations that contributed to the team becoming pop culture icons. Witness the players' quest to set the record straight and illuminate the truth behind the legacy of arguably the greatest college basketball team of all time.
response.title: Kings of Vegas

results.name: Kings of Vegas doc producers Phil Lopez and Mark Hamer talk 1990 Runnin' Rebels - March 28, 2024
